techmeme.title: SK Hynix's union approves a 6% wage bump and 10% allocation of SK's annual profit to a bonus pool, totaling ~$2.7B for 33,625 staff in 2025, averting a strike (Yoolim Lee/Bloomberg)
GSR fund documents: TikTok rival Xiaohongshu, known as RedNote in the US, saw its valuation rise 19% to $31B from $26B in March during recent GSR transactions (Echo Wong/Bloomberg)
Sources: Alibaba, ByteDance, and other Chinese tech companies remain keen on Nvidia's AI chips despite Beijing strongly discouraging them from such purchases (Reuters)
Philips Hue unveils a major product refresh at IFA 2025, including a $90 Hue Bridge Pro, updated $25 smart bulbs, and the $169 Hue Secure doorbell, its first (Jennifer Pattison Tuohy/The Verge)
Tencent releases HunyuanWorld-Voyager, an open-weights AI model that generates 3D-consistent video sequences from a single image, trained on 100K+ video clips (Benj Edwards/Ars Technica)
